FAQ

Yes, you should have basic swimming ability for safety reasons.

The Atlantic is fresh, sometimes cold, but our top-quality wetsuits keep you comfortable throughout your lesson.

You don’t need to be super fit. A reasonable fitness level and basic swimming skills are enough, lessons are adapted to each person’s ability.
